content.rendered:
Weddings

D’Lashes Loves Weddings. Every bride wants to look her best on her wedding day. She wants to look exquisite. Timeless. Natural.

Using light, wispy lashes, D’Lashes enhances the natural beauty of our brides-to-be. We play into the coy and flirty look by adding a beautiful, natural flare onto the bride’s existing lashes. When you gaze into the face of the happy bride, you won’t see the work we put into the finished look. Instead you’ll see the complete, utter happiness that encompasses her spirit. You’ll see the polished palette and inventive pairings we use. You’ll see a fashionable, clean look that never goes out of style!

Let D’Lashes lash you out for your big day! We can customize different looks, based on several different variables, such as wedding theme, personality,
wedding dress style and more.

Check out our fabulous brides that we’ve lashed out
in the past!
